caption.title: R 0 updating using importation data.
caption.p: Consider a hypothetical scenario in which the first 15 terminal ZIKV importations into Texas arrive in Harris county (which includes Houston) during August 2016. (A) Estimated Harris county R 0 for August 2016 a priori (dark grey) and after accounting for the 15 (light grey) terminal importations (Future August). These distributions are composed of 1,000 samples from the prior and posterior distributions (respectively). (B) Median R 0 estimates for August before (August 2016) and following (Future August) the importation-based update.
Click here for additional data file.
